recipe.title: Smoked Salmon Platter with Dill Sour Cream
instructions: Arrange salmon slices on large platter. Mix sour cream and dill in small bowl to blend. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Spoon sour cream mixture in center of salmon. Sprinkle shallots and capers over salmon. Serve salmon platter with crackers or bread.
